issues.title: Elements must meet minimum color contrast ratio thresholds
issues.description: Ensure the contrast between foreground and background colors meets WCAG 2 AA minimum contrast ratio thresholds

any.message: Element has insufficient color contrast of 2.77 (foreground color: #ffffff, background color: #4caf50, font size: 12.0pt (16px), font weight: normal). Expected contrast ratio of 4.5:1

nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  Element has insufficient color contrast of 2.77 (foreground color: #ffffff, background color: #4caf50, font size: 12.0pt (16px), font weight: normal). Expected contrast ratio of 4.5:1

issues.title: This element has insufficient contrast at this conformance level. Expected a contrast ratio of at least 4.5:1, but text in this element has a contrast ratio of 2.78:1. Recommendation:  change background to #258829.
issues.description: <button>Calculate Inflation</button>

original_issue.message: This element has insufficient contrast at this conformance level. Expected a contrast ratio of at least 4.5:1, but text in this element has a contrast ratio of 2.78:1. Recommendation:  change background to #258829.
original_issue.selector: html > body > div:nth-child(3) > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(1) > button

issues.title: Background and foreground colors do not have a sufficient contrast ratio.
issues.description: Low-contrast text is difficult or impossible for many users to read. [Learn how to provide sufficient color contrast](https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/4.10/color-contrast).

node.explanation:
Fix any of the following:
  Element has insufficient color contrast of 2.77 (foreground color: #ffffff, background color: #4caf50, font size: 12.0pt (16px), font weight: normal). Expected contrast ratio of 4.5:1

issues.title: Form elements must have labels
issues.description: Ensure every form element has a label

any.message: Element does not have an implicit (wrapped) <label>
Element does not have an explicit <label>
aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty
aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty
Element has no title attribute
Element has no placeholder attribute
Element's default semantics were not overridden with role="none" or role="presentation"

issues.title: Form elements do not have associated labels
issues.description: Labels ensure that form controls are announced properly by assistive technologies, like screen readers. [Learn more about form element labels](https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/4.10/label).

node.explanation:
Fix any of the following:
  Element does not have an implicit (wrapped) <label>
  Element does not have an explicit <label>
  aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty
  aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty
  Element has no title attribute
  Element has no placeholder attribute
  Element's default semantics were not overridden with role="none" or role="presentation"

issues.title: Links must be distinguishable without relying on color
issues.description: Ensure links are distinguished from surrounding text in a way that does not rely on color

relatedNodes.html: © Official Data Foundation / Alioth LLC. Contact · Privacy policy

relatedNodes.html: © Official Data Foundation / Alioth LLC. Contact · Privacy policy

any.message: The link has no styling (such as underline) to distinguish it from the surrounding text

nodes.failureSummary:

  The link has insufficient color contrast of 1.68:1 with the surrounding text. (Minimum contrast is 3:1, link text: #1a0dab, surrounding text: #000000)

issues.title: Links rely on color to be distinguishable.
issues.description: Low-contrast text is difficult or impossible for many users to read. Link text that is discernible improves the experience for users with low vision. [Learn how to make links distinguishable](https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/4.10/link-in-text-block).

node.explanation:
Fix any of the following:
  The link has insufficient color contrast of 1.68:1 with the surrounding text. (Minimum contrast is 3:1, link text: #1a0dab, surrounding text: #000000)
  The link has no styling (such as underline) to distinguish it from the surrounding text

issues.title: The relationship between td elements and their associated th elements is not defined. Use either the scope attribute on th elements, or the headers attribute on td elements.
issues.description: ...

original_issue.message: The relationship between td elements and their associated th elements is not defined. Use either the scope attribute on th elements, or the headers attribute on td elements.

automatic.name: Size; Target Size; Element too small

issues.title: Touch targets do not have sufficient size or spacing.
issues.description: Touch targets with sufficient size and spacing help users who may have difficulty targeting small controls to activate the targets. [Learn more about touch targets](https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/4.10/target-size).

node.explanation:
Fix any of the following:
  Target has insufficient size (135.2px by 18px, should be at least 24px by 24px)
  Target has insufficient space to its closest neighbors. Safe clickable space has a diameter of 19px instead of at least 24px.
